issue.title: add validation date in "validation panel"
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

* Save the user who validated/rejected the order
* Differ the view for todo/done validation (keep the current layout for the "todo")
* In the valiudation done view :
** Add the validated date and who did it in a phrase: "Validated on 02.03.2015 by My Supername" or "Rejected on 02.03.2015 by My Supername"
** Hide the mandate reference (since it has been validated, it has not much importance)
* In the order recap view:
** Ad the same phrase : "Validated on 02.03.2015 by My Supername" or "Rejected on 02.03.2015 by My Supername" in the thirdparty block
** Move the validation/rejection remark in the thirdparty block


!validation_list.png!

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
